## IEasyCallControlBase interface

Base interface containing APIs shared between [ISingleCallControl](./jabra-js.isinglecallcontrol.md) and [IMultiCallControl](./jabra-js.imulticallcontrol.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface IEasyCallControlBase 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [device](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.device.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) | The single physical device to which the easy call control functionalities are associated to. |
|  [muteState](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.mutestate.md) |  | Observable&lt;[MuteState](./jabra-js.mutestate.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Emits the mute state of the device whenever that state changes. |
|  [onDisconnect](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.ondisconnect.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Observable&lt;void&gt; | Emits when the connection used for easy call control gets disconnected. |
|  [ringState](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.ringstate.md) |  | Observable&lt;boolean&gt; | Emits the ring state of the device whenever that state changes. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [endCall()](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.endcall.md) | Ends the current call. |
|  [mute()](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.mute.md) | Mutes the device. |
|  [mute()](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.mute_1.md) | Mute the device. |
|  [rejectIncomingCall()](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.rejectincomingcall.md) | Rejects an incoming call. |
|  [signalIncomingCall(ringTimeout)](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.signalincomingcall.md) | Signals that there is an incoming call. The promise resolves only once the incoming call is either accepted or rejected. |
|  [startCall()](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.startcall.md) | Sets the device into call state. |
|  [teardown()](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.teardown.md) | <p>Teardown the Easy Call Control instance.</p><p>All internal state subscriptions will be stopped to avoid potential memory leaks, and the internal call lock will be released if taken.</p><p>After using this method, you must create a new Easy Call Control instance to continue usage.</p> |
|  [unmute()](./jabra-js.ieasycallcontrolbase.unmute.md) | Unmutes the device. |
